channel.title: INall
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INall, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: As her kids turn 18, Angelina Jolie may be looking to sell her historic $24.5 million L.A. estate
item.description: Jolie is said to be getting ready to sell the home she has lived in for the last 8 years—as she prepares for a move away from the U.S.
